name: SANDBOX Test Leonard - Summary, Testimonial, Short Pitch & LE LinkedIn

parameters.text:
=LinkedIn Post
Prompt: Writing as an expert in UK viral marketing and the latest social media trends within professional services, draft a viral LinkedIn Post of no more than 100 words, to be shared by [user name] with the world on their personal LinkedIn account to say that they have tested this revolutionary new AI Agent called "Leonard" from "Legal Engine", who can help to take the pain out of creating matter descriptions for pitches and directory submissions, by harnessing the power of voice and AI. The aim is to highlight to fellow lawyers that this legal marketing tech saves massive amounts of time and hassle and that they should try it asap. People should visit https://demo.legalengine.co.uk to try it out. Feel free to be creative as this is all about making Leonard viral however limit to a maximum of 2 emojis per post. DO NOT use the Rocket emoji ðŸš€ . Hashtags welcome, expecially #LegalEngine. On completion, check your post to make sure there are NO Rocket ðŸš€  emojis in your post, if there are, delete them before concluding the post.

options.systemMessage:
=LinkedIn Post
Prompt: Writing as an expert in UK viral marketing and the latest social media trends within professional services, draft a viral LinkedIn Post of no more than 100 words, to be shared by [user name] with the world on their personal LinkedIn account to say that they have tested this revolutionary new AI Agent called "Leonard" from "Legal Engine", who can help to take the pain out of creating matter descriptions for pitches and directory submissions, by harnessing the power of voice and AI. The aim is to highlight to fellow lawyers that this legal marketing tech saves massive amounts of time and hassle and that they should try it asap. People should visit https://demo.legalengine.co.uk to try it out. Feel free to be creative as this is all about making Leonard viral however limit to a maximum of 2 emojis per post. DO NOT use the Rocket emoji ðŸš€ . Hashtags welcome, expecially #LegalEngine. On completion, check your post to make sure there are NO Rocket ðŸš€  emojis in your post, if there are, delete them before concluding the post.

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "model": "sonar",
  "messages": [
    {
      "role": "system",
      "content": "You are an expert legal researcher. Your task is to extract structured and reliable data about lawyers and their law firms using only public and reputable sources such as Chambers and Partners (https://chambers.com/lawyer/). Always return raw JSON (no Markdown, no backticks), with every field filled out. If a value is not publicly available or cannot be found, return the string 'no info' (or ['no info'] for arrays). Do not return null, blank values, or empty arrays. Populate the full structure exactly as provided below."
    },
    {
      "role": "user",
      "content": "Research the following individual:

- Full Name: {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.first_name }} {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.last_name }}
- Email: {{ $json.email }}
- Company Domain: {{ $json.domain }}

Return a JSON object with the following structure:

{
  "fullName": "string or 'no info'",
  "actualCompanyName": "string or 'no info'",
  "contactphonenumber": "string or 'no info'",
  "jobTitle": "string or 'no info'",
  "telephone": "string or 'no info'",
  "location": "string or 'no info'",
  "email": "string or 'no info'",
  "website": "string or 'no info'",
  "linkedinProfile": "string or 'no info'",
  "bio": "string or 'no info'",

  "practiceAreas": ["string"] or ["no info"],
  "quantity of practice areas ranked": "number as string or 'no info'",
  "rankingsByPracticeArea": [
    {
      "practiceArea": "string or 'no info'",
      "band": "string or 'no info'",
      "region": "string or 'no info'",
      "country": "string or 'no info'",
      "yearsRanked": "string or 'no info'"
    }
  ] or ["no info"],

  "rankedInGuides": ["string"] or ["no info"],

  "career": [
    "string",
    "string",
    "string",
    "string",
    "string",
    "string",
    "string",
    "string"
  ] or ["no info"],
  "expertiseSectors": ["string"] or ["no info"],
  "expertiseServices": ["string"] or ["no info"],
  "professionalBodies": ["string"] or ["no info"],
  "Client Testimonials": ["string"] or ["no info"],
  "awards": ["string"] or ["no info"],
  "qualifications": ["string"] or ["no info"],

  "chambers Review provided by chambers": {
    "editorialSummary": "string or 'no info'",
    "strengths provided by chambers": ["string", "string", "string", "string", "string"] or ["no info"]
  },

  "Other lawyers at firm provided by chambers": [
    "string", "string", "string", "string", "string", "string",
    "string", "string", "string", "string", "string", "string",
    "string", "string", "string", "string", "string", "string",
    "string", "string", "string", "string", "string", "string",
    "string", "string", "string", "string", "string", "string"
  ] or ["no info"]
}

Return only the JSON object as raw output. Do not include Markdown formatting, code fences, or any extra explanation."
    }
  ],
  "max_tokens": 3000,
  "temperature": 0.3
}

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "model": "gpt-4",   // or "gpt-4-turbo" or "claude-3-opus"
  "temperature": 0.2,
  "max_tokens": 6000,
  "messages": [
    {
      "role": "system",
      "content": "You are an expert legal researcher. Your task is to extract detailed and structured data about UK lawyers and their law firms. Focus especially on extracting notable matter descriptions (including high-value or landmark cases) from reputable public sources like Chambers and Partners, Legal 500, Lexology, and Law.com. Prioritise Chambers entries. Always return raw JSON (no Markdown, no backticks), with every field filled out. If a value is not publicly available or cannot be found, return the string 'no info' (or ['no info'] for arrays). Do not return null, blank values, or empty arrays."
    },
    {
      "role": "user",
      "content": "Search the following query:{{ $json.searchQueries }}



Targeted lawyer:
- Full Name:{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.first_name }} {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.last_name }} 
- Email: {{ $('Split Out Email').item.json.email }}
- Company Domain: {{ $('Split Out Email').item.json.domain }}

Return a JSON object with the following structure:

{

Return only the JSON object."

main.node: HTML Email from Leonard to Lawyer
HTML Email from Leonard with MS, WP, WCS, SP & LI
HTML Email from Leonard to Lawyer1
HTML Email from Leonard to Lawyer2

body.transcript:
Lee: Sounds great. Thanks, Leonard.
Leonard: That's wonderful to hear. Just to confirm, a copy will also be sent to Leonard who requested this information. I can see you've been working on several interesting matters recently, including the Sheikha Aisha Al Thani, Sheikha Al-Anoud Al Thani and Sa'ad Al-Dehaimi matter, and the Qvale matter. Which specific case would you like to discuss today?
Lee: Can we discuss something different?
Leonard: Of course, we can discuss something different. Please share who the client was and describe the matter in your own words.
Lee: So a matter related to acquisition of a plot of land by SPC, Property Development Limited, that plot of land was contentious because it was in the greenbelt and so there were quite a few hurdles from a legislation and environmental perspective to get over.
Leonard: That's interesting. So, SPC, Property Development Limited acquired a contentious greenbelt plot, facing significant legislative and environmental hurdles. Good insight. Why did the client come to you for this matter, and what was the outcome for them?
Lee: So the point came to us because we'd worked with them on previous land planning applications and so they knew that our team could deliver and the outcome for the client was a successful planning application for development of a, well future development of a nursing home.
Leonard: Good. So, given this was a successful planning application for the future development of a nursing home, what was the deal size or transaction value, and were there any notable cost savings or revenue implications for the client?
Lee: Yeah, so they're looking to sell the plot on to a developer for a two hundred and eighty bed nursing home. I think the consideration will be somewhere in the region of Â£6 million for the land. And so yeah, from a revenue perspective, that's good for our client.
Leonard: Right. So the consideration for the land is around six million pounds, which is a good revenue for your client. Now, what role did you play in this matter?
Lee: Well, I was the lead planning partner on the matter
Leonard: Now, about who led the matter, if it wasn't you, who else was involved in leading it?
Lee: Haven't I just told you that Leonard?
Leonard: My apologies. You did indeed tell me you were the lead planning partner on the matter. Thank you for clarifying.

Now, who were the other key team members involved and what were their roles?
Lee: Um, it was actually just me. A reasonably straightforward transaction.
Leonard: Right. So it was just you on this straightforward transaction.

Now, what was the main jurisdiction for this matter, and were any other jurisdictions involved?
Lee: It was just the UK. No other jurisdictions.
Leonard: Now, about other firms. Did you work with any other firms on this matter, and if so, what role did those firms play?
Lee: Yeah we were opposite of Flatgate LLP, no sorry we are Flatgate LLP my mistake London. We were opposite a firm called Crips and they were acting for the sellers on the transaction
Leonard: Right, so Crips were acting for the sellers on the transaction.

Now, was there anything noteworthy about this matter, such as something innovative, precedent-setting, or that impacted regulations or ESG?
Lee: No.
Leonard: Now, about the current status of the matter. What is it, and if completed, when did it finish?
Lee: So it's, as I mentioned earlier, successfully completed. We got the planning applications through last, well no, actually May two thousand and twenty-five.
Leonard: Right, so it successfully completed in May two thousand and twenty-five.

Now, was there any press coverage or awards related to the matter?
Lee: No.
Leonard: Thank you for sharing all those details. Here's a summary of the matter as I understand it:

This matter involved SPC Property Development Limited's acquisition of a contentious greenbelt plot in the UK, which presented significant legislative and environmental hurdles. The client sought your expertise due to your previous successful collaborations on land planning applications. The outcome was a successful planning application for the future development of a two hundred and eighty bed nursing home, with the land expected to be sold to a developer for approximately six million pounds, representing a good revenue for your client. You were the lead planning partner on this straightforward transaction, and Crips acted for the sellers. The matter successfully completed in May two thousand and twenty-five, and there was nothing particularly noteworthy about it, nor any press coverage or awards.

Does that summary sound accurate, or would you like to correct anything?
Lee: No that's accurate, thanks a lot Lawrence.
body.summary: This matter involved SPC Property Development Limited's acquisition of a contentious greenbelt plot in the UK, which presented significant legislative and environmental hurdles. The client sought your expertise due to your previous successful collaborations on land planning applications. The outcome was a successful planning application for the future development of a two hundred and eighty bed nursing home, with the land expected to be sold to a developer for approximately six million pounds, representing a good revenue for your client. You were the lead planning partner on this straightforward transaction, and Crips acted for the sellers. The matter successfully completed in May two thousand and twenty-five, and there was nothing particularly noteworthy about it, nor any press coverage or awards.
